creditline: The Miscellaneous Works of Art Purchase Fund
description: Tapestry; warp undyed wool, 6-7 ends per cm.; weft dyed wool and silk, 28-40 ends per cm.
markings: in the lower galloon at the left: \'B [pink escutcheon] B\' (The mark of Brussels); in the right galloon towards the bottom: an unidentified weaver\'s mark
title: Battle Scene
